location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

principalId.Description: The principal id of Automanage account identity.

tenantId.Description: The tenant id associated with the Automanage account.

type.Description: The type of identity used for the Automanage account. Currently, the only supported type is 'SystemAssigned', which implicitly creates an identity. Possible values include: 'SystemAssigned', 'None'

configurationProfile.Description: A value indicating configuration profile. Possible values include: 'Azure virtual machine best practices – Dev/Test', 'Azure virtual machine best practices – Production'

accountId.Description: The Automanage account ARM Resource URI

configurationProfilePreferenceId.Description: The configuration profile custom preferences ARM resource URI

provisioningState.Description: The state of onboarding, which only appears in the response. Possible values include: 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Created'

compliance.Description: The compliance status for the configuration profile assignment.

6.Value: Azure virtual machine best practices – Dev/Test
Azure virtual machine best practices – Production

updateStatus.Description: The state of compliance, which only appears in the response. Possible values include: 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Created'

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

vmBackup.Description: Automanage configuration profile VM Backup preferences.

timeZone.Description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: Pacific Standard Time

instantRpRetentionRangeInDays.Description: Instant RP retention policy range in days

retentionPolicy.Description: Retention policy with the details on backup copy retention ranges.

schedulePolicy.Description: Backup schedule specified as part of backup policy.

enableRealTimeProtection.Description: Enables or disables Real Time Protection. Possible values include: 'True', 'False'

exclusions.Description: Extensions, Paths and Processes that must be excluded from scan

runScheduledScan.Description: Enables or disables a periodic scan for antimalware. Possible values include: 'True', 'False'

scanType.Description: Type of scheduled scan. Possible values include: 'Quick', 'Full'
